title: Kashid Beach
subtitle: White sands, turquoise waters, and lush green hills
overview: Kashid Beach is a picturesque seaside destination located along the Konkan coast between Alibaug and Murud in Maharashtra. Known for its white sand, clear blue waters, and green surroundings, it is a favorite weekend retreat for Mumbaikars and Punekars.

The beach is relatively clean and well-maintained, stretching over 3 kilometers. It's nestled between two hills and surrounded by casuarina groves, making it ideal for relaxing, photography, and gentle adventure activities.
Kashid offers the perfect blend of scenic beauty and accessibility, being just around 125 km from Mumbai. It attracts families, couples, and solo travelers looking for peace, fun, and nature.

highlights.title: White Sand Beach
highlights.description: Soft, white sands and turquoise waves give Kashid a tropical vibe.

highlights.title: Clean Waters
highlights.description: Crystal-clear waters ideal for safe swimming and beach sports.

highlights.title: Casuarina Groves
highlights.description: Tree-lined beach provides natural shade and picnic spots.

highlights.title: Hill Views
highlights.description: The beach is flanked by forested hills, adding to its secluded beauty.

geography.intro: Kashid Beach lies on the Arabian Sea coastline in the Raigad district, about 30 km from Alibaug.

details.label: Flora
details.value: Casuarinas, coconut palms, and coastal shrubs

climate.description: Kashid experiences tropical weather with warm summers, lush monsoons, and cool winters. Best season is post-monsoon through February.

geography.conclusion: Its flat beach, scenic backdrop, and proximity to Alibaug make Kashid a perfect coastal retreat.

activities.title: Water Sports
activities.description: Enjoy jet skiing, banana boat rides, and bumper rides along the beach.

activities.title: Camping
activities.description: Experience beachside camping under the stars with bonfires and barbeques.
info: Tents and meals provided in packages

activities.title: Photography
activities.description: Capture panoramic views, sunsets, and lush casuarina backdrops.
info: Early mornings and evenings are best

activities.title: Sketching & Painting
activities.description: Ideal setting for artists to draw landscapes or seascapes.
info: Beach benches and quiet zones available

attractions.title: Murud-Janjira Fort
attractions.description: A majestic sea fort located 20 km from Kashid, famous for its stronghold history and architecture.

attractions.title: Phansad Wildlife Sanctuary
attractions.description: Lush forest reserve home to leopards, birds, and medicinal plants.

attractions.title: Datta Mandir Hill
attractions.description: Small hilltop temple offering panoramic views of the beach.

marineLife.intro: Kashid's clean, undeveloped shoreline allows a modest variety of intertidal life to thrive in tide pools and shallow zones.

items.title: Tide Pool Fish
items.description: Small fish and marine insects visible in rocky edges during low tide.

items.title: Shore Birds
items.description: Watch herons, kingfishers, and seagulls early in the morning.

items.title: Seaweed & Shells
items.description: Beach is lined with natural shells, coral pieces, and occasional seaweed mats.

conclusion: Kashid's clean shoreline makes it a great spot for families and nature lovers.
While not ideal for diving, its calm environment supports small marine and bird life.

howToReach.title: By Air
details: Nearest Airport: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Mumbai (125 km)
Hire taxi or drive via Alibaug–Revdanda–Kashid coastal route

howToReach.title: By Train
details: Nearest Station: Roha Railway Station (Konkan Line, 50 km away)

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Mumbai to Kashid: 125 km via NH66 and Alibaug road
Private cars, MSRTC buses, and local taxis available

howToReach.title: By Ferry
details: Ferries available from Gateway of India to Mandwa Jetty
From Mandwa, travel by road via Alibaug to Kashid

bookingTips.description: Best to book 1–2 weeks ahead for weekends
Monsoon Season: Avoid water activities due to high tides
Combo Packages: Camping + Water Sports deals
Transport: Hire cars or bikes from Alibaug for flexibility
